alert.note: Alert for Clay; Greene (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 05 at 12:13PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of east central Greene, eastern Clay, Pemiscot and Dunklin Counties through 1245 PM CDT... At 1213 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Bernie to near Kennett to Arbyrd. Movement was east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Kennett, Caruthersville, Malden, Piggott, Portageville, Hayti, Steele, Campbell, Senath, Clarkton, Holcomb, Hayti Heights, Arbyrd, Wardell, St. Francis, Glennonville, Bolton, Deering, Saint Francis and Bragg City. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 400 PM CDT for eastern Arkansas...southeastern Missouri...and west Tennessee.
